attributes.action: Immediately ban NHS funding of homoeopathy and redirect the resources to proven medicine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Immediately ban NHS funding of homoeopathy and redirect the resources to proven medicine."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17457


Prime Minister's Office
